title: LC3 Style Grand Confort Armchair Black
body: Our Charles Le Corbusier style LC3 chair is iconic, cubic perfection. The foam cushions are Dacron-wrapped, just like the original. This makes them fuller and prevents sagging. The cushions are then covered in top-grain aniline leather, which comes in a selection of colours for every taste. This modern club chair is composed of a chrome frame and four black leather cushions. The result is a spectacular chair.
